text: Midnight Madonna is a 1937 American drama movie directed by James Flood and starring Warren William, Mady Correll, Edward Ellis, Jonathan Hale, Joe Sawyer, Irene Franklin, Joseph Crehan. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by James Flood Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Midnight Madonna
